borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<div>The scale, siting and design of the proposed development are considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, July 2021);<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy D4 of the
London Plan (March 2021);<o:p></o:p></span></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy
CP3 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies BP8 and BP11 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough
Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012); and<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">









</p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of Barking and
Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021).<o:p></o:p></p></div>

<p><span style="font-size: 14px;">The proposed development will be disproportionately large, having nearly the same footprint as the&nbsp;original dwellinghouse, which would present a discordant use of the garden setting which is harmful to the surrounding&nbsp;character and appearance. As such, the proposal is found to be unacceptable and contrary to the following policies:</span></p><p><ol></ol></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span><span style="font-size: 14px;">National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, July 2021);</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy
D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy
CP3 of </span><span style="font-size: 14px;">Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies BP8 and BP11 of the </span><span style="font-size: 14px;">Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough
Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);</span><o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="line-height: 107%;" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"=""><span style="font-size: 14px;">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012); and</span><o:p></o:p></span></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;">









</span></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;" pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of </span><span style="font-size: 14px;">The London Borough of Barking and
Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021).</span><o:p></o:p></p>
